title: CSS Logo
desc: A redesigned CSS Logo, chosen by the community and the CSS-Next community group, a part of the W3C. The design includes many hat tips to CSS like rounded corners, tooltips and color pickers.

title: SuperEffective.gg
desc: Born in 2022, it has become one of the most popular PokéDex trackers and box organizers in the Pokémon community, with more than 50K active users.

title: StoryLite
desc: [Experimental] Lightweight Storybook alternative written on top of Vite. A drop-in app for rapid React component development and visualisation.

title: JynXS
desc: [Experimental] Small (~3KB) JSX runtime that implements the very basics of React including state and effects, but adding many extras on top like async components and conditional classNames.
